```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(rmarkdown)
library(bit64)
library(dplyr)
options(scipen=999)
```


# Reading files
```{r}
race<-read.csv("race.csv")
age<-read.csv("age.csv")
income<-read.csv("income.csv")
```


# dropping the 'X' column
```{r}
race<-subset(race, select=-c(X))
income<-subset(income, select=-c(X))
age<-subset(age, select = -c(X))
```


# merging the files
```{r}
merge1<-merge(race,age, by.x="Geo_FIPS",by.y="Geo_FIPS",all = T)
merge2<-merge(merge1,income,by.x="Geo_FIPS",by.y="Geo_FIPS", all=T)
tail(merge2)
```



# subsetting relevant info
```{r}
relevant<-subset(merge2, select=c(median.age,minorityportion ,MEDIAN.INCOME,Geo_FIPS))
```



# Read data. 

```{r}
write.csv(merge2,"MEGA_combined_census.csv")
write.csv(relevant, "census_info.csv")
```
